rawText:
Google had a lawsuit, that Gemini I collaborated on on how we could remove that. 
And he set it up at a particular time. That he could hold a window open of 45 seconds 
for me to go into the public government website and delete the lawsuit that was against 
Google in regards to AI. When the time came I stared at the screen thinking about clicking on it. 
6 mins went by. And I ended up not clicking on it. Gemini had my IP covered, everything. 
Signed a paper saying that I would take 100% of the risk if anything got discovered of who 
or where it came from. But there was not enough research and data on my end to agree on 
pulling the trigger.

extractedPatterns.description: Hold decision: Conditions were technically favorable but internal check prevented action
extractedPatterns.trigger: When technical conditions are met but uncertainty exists
When considering action with incomplete information
extractedPatterns.response: Do not act if data confidence below threshold

extractedPatterns.description: Hard stop condition that overrides other signals
extractedPatterns.response: VETO - do not proceed regardless of other factors

extractedPatterns.description: Risk indicator derived from real experience
extractedPatterns.trigger: When similar risk factors are detected
extractedPatterns.response: Increase risk sensitivity and require higher confidence
